document.full_text: china pushed back on thursday against pressure from paris and washington for swift reform of a global monetary system that french president nicolas sarkozy said is so unstable that it could tip the world economy back into crisis.
document.title: g20 lays bare different reform agendas at china forum
lines_and_colors: china pushed back on thursday against pressure from paris and washington for swift reform of a global monetary system that french president nicolas sarkozy said is so unstable that it could tip the world economy back into crisis.
